website_summaries.verdict: A blend of quality materials and attention to detail make this a fantastic option for budget-conscious buyers.
pros: Made from premium leather for superior durability and comfort
Understated design is suitable for everyday use
Stitching provides a bit of appealing contrast
Large variety of colors to choose from
cons: While it fits most, those with larger wrists may require a longer band

customer_reviews.title: Overall Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! After using it for everyday for the last 16-months, there was a West and tear with the leather buckle, and I feel it was quite normal given the friction that particular part goes thru day in and day out. For the $$, durability, and make of the product, I was extremely satisfied and highly recommend this to anyone interested in a good leather strap. The fit was seamless and product was above and beyond what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: AAK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Band
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality leather-like band. It looks and feels similar to real leather. Definitely note the brown is more orange-like in person, but this is clear in my photos and other customer images. Installation was insanely easy thanks to Apple as well as this band’s compatibility. I was very surprised by how sturdy the band feels. Putting on the watch and taking it off feels very secure and does not feel like it’s bending the material; a problem I have with many expensive actual watches. The band is tightened, loosened and removed with total ease. Great price, great value, highly recommended. I will update this review should the material prematurely decay...but note the free lifetime unlimited warranty!
customer_reviews.author: John Lobel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After reading several review and doing a lot of research, I purchased this Apple Watch band seven days ago. I have been wearing this band for a full five days until it broke last night. The clasp fell apart and sent my Apple Watch face flying across the concrete. Luckily, there was no damage to the face of my watch. Below is a picture of the watch band after five days. Very disappointed. UPDATE: Amazing customer service! When my review had been published, they promptly contacted me and sent me a replacement band without any questions. I was astonished by how quickly they resolved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking band!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was nervous at first because of other reviews saying the band came apart but a little screw driver and extra screws were included.
customer_reviews.author: sydking

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the price and wasn't expecting much. I figured I would use it a couple of times and would then have to get a new one. I was pleasantly surprised. It's held up very well. I bought the light brown one and love it. I'm a claims adjuster and am sometimes hard on a watch. I will say the leather does scuff a bit because it's so smooth but it doesn't bother me. The scuffs don't show on the black one I bought. They only show on the brown one because of the color. I would buy it again and will probably get more colors. I like to switch them out depending on what I'm wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality smart looking watch band
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, looks more expensive than what it is. I have been to the Apple store and this is almost compatible with apples expensive bands. I’ve been wearing with the 44mm Apple Watch 4. It makes the watch look smarter (ideal for the office) and I have received several compliments already on it. Had it for over a week, so far so good, comfortable and look forward to wearing it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: P Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Surprising comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear my watch when I go to Yoga. I expected the normal, always adjusting, always having to move it on my wrist. In the two classes I’ve worn this band, if was surprised at the comfort. I forgot about it till my watch buzzed to remind me of something. I expected the band to turn dark when wet, so far just splashing water on from hand washing the band showed no discoloration. It appears very water resistant. It's a big band. I’m almost 6 ft 200lbs I’m in the middle of the adjustment. I’m surprised at the quality, finish, fit, look, design. Dressed my iWatch up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Swanky
customer_reviews.text: One of the features of the Apple watch that is pretty cool is that you can quickly swap out the band to fit your needs or outfit. I was interested in being a little more trendy making my watch match my outfit at customer sites. To make things a little more interesting was that I wanted a leather band. These are very nice and comfortable. They are also very well made. I've received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: T. Person

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dress Up or Down
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, I do not get paid to write reviews. I also did not receive this product for free in exchange for a good review. I purchased numerous watch bands prior to receiving my new Apple Watch and this is easily my favorite. It looks very clean and can be used with dress clothes or casual. I wouldn’t necessarily recommend wearing for workouts as the leather looks unprotected on the underside and sweat will just cause staining and eventually small odor. Overall a great purchase and one that I would do again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice at first. But don't let the "genuine leather" and looks fool you. Leather started cracking in less than a week of using it. If you want a cheap leather band, buy this item. If you want a band that will last and age, I'd advise buying a nice one. I would not recommend this item to a friend, nor would I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great band. Awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the band for over a year. It is the main band that I use with the watch, which about 98% of the time. And I wear my watch almost 24/7 except for when it's on the charger. And it has been through a lot of rough playing with my two little sons. Love the band. It fits and looks very stylish. After a year, the band tore at the end (and this is after heavy heavy use for over a year), I emailed customer service. They replaced the band, no question asked. Great band. Great customer service. If the warranty period was over, I would have bought an exact replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: but so far this is the best one and the one that has last the longest
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many apple watchbands before, but so far this is the best one and the one that has last the longest. I guess it is safe to say that the classic features are the best; this watch adjusts to any size wrist with the belt type closing. I say this because I have bought those watchbands that are magnetic and do not need to be locked, but these are the worse because I move a lot and I have to constantly adjust the band so the watch does not fall off. So far, I have more than 5 months with the same band and I still looks good on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company and quality watch bands!
customer_reviews.text: Marge Plus is a fabtastic company; wonderful customer service, solid products, and great warranty. I’ve bought the brown one and I’ve received lots of compliments at work. However, I’m pretty rough with my watch so the band broke after a couple months. I emailed Marge Plus if they could send me a new one but in black instead. They quickly replied and gave me a coupon code that would make my next purchase free. If you’re looking for a quality band and great customer service, buy this watch band!
customer_reviews.author: David Tran

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a high quality band for the price... but wow!! I love this band. It's perfect for my rose gold watch and it's actually way more comfortable than the original sport band the watch comes with. I've only worn it for a day, so I can't say how long it lasts yet, but so far, I definitely got my money's worth and wouldn't mind buying again :)
customer_reviews.author: SarD

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable leather band you’ll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to get this band for myself and I’m glad I made this choice. It is very well made and the leather scratches, which is suppose to happen. It makes it look worn and a little older. The color of the leather band goes perfect with the watch. All the other parts are made out of stainless steel and don’t rust! I love this band and would recommend this to others! Also, side not, the customer service is outstanding! Thank you for a great customer experience!
customer_reviews.author: Bosoxfan221

customer_reviews.title: Great band for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three different colors and I love each one of the them!! I like how the leather is comfortable and not stiff which makes it easy to put on. Highly recommend you will not be disappointed. I will probably be adding another color to my collection in the following months. So far I have the tan one, gold, and now lovely lilac.
customer_reviews.author: Kardenya Falls

customer_reviews.title: Great for the apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I have always complained that the apple watched looks cheap and ugly, however, this strap changed my mind, I only ever used it to work out but after buying this I'm no longer afraid to use it outside. I'm really picky with what I wear and really like the look of this strap. Also I'm into watches so I was never really conviced by the apple watch until now.
customer_reviews.author: Julio C

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this band without doing too much research and am pleasantly surprised by how well it's held up. I've been wearing it daily for about 4 months and it's still in perfect condition. It definitely dresses the Apple Watch up a little. I also have eczema and this watch band vs. the rubber one seemed to help with that issue too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to more expensive bands!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not paying the arm and leg that Apple charges for watch bands, especially since I have about 10 different ones. I bought another leather band earlier this year that fell apart after washing my hands a few times. This band is made of genuine leather and looks great. It's a soft brown, not too dark and the packaging looked *very* similar to the orange boxes you can get at the Apple store. Looks great and price was right. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first aftermarket band so I was a little nervous. I just upgraded from the original apple watch to the series 4 but didn't want to pay what Apple charges for a leather band, so I took a chance. The result, I'm very happy. The picture of the band above makes it look like suede but in reality it is smooth leather. Appears to be very good quality and is soft and conforming to my wrist. The connection align perfectly and it is very comfortable not to mention it looks great. Highly recommend and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Edward Luczak

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking band, not amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: This company's customer service is outstanding. After writing that my band broke after a few months they were kind enough to offer me a new band, free of charge. This is a nice looking Apple Watch band, I received constant compliments on how it looked! It is simple, and classy. However, the band wore and got dirty very easily, and eventually broke after a little under 2 months of gentle wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Powers

customer_reviews.title: A perfect and inexpensive replacement band. A+ value
customer_reviews.text: So, it’s a $15 leather band for your watch. Yep, it’s not going to equal the $85-$100 leather bands sold in the Apple stores but guess what... it looks great new and holds up fairly well. I’ve had it for six months and wear it daily for work. I switch to the original sport band when working out or doing things like yard work or vehicle maintenance - which cuts down on the wear and tear on the leather. When it’s finally worn, I won’t hesitate to drop $15 on another without a second thought knowing I’m still saving a ton of money over.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thoms

customer_reviews.title: Good Band for the Price !!
customer_reviews.text: The Band is great - but didn't expect the Colour to be too LIGHT ! Which is why I only put 4 Stars! I am about the same colour in completion :)... so it wasn't showing up - some may like that but I didn't - so I ordered two-three more Bands ! Other than that it is does what it needs to do ! It's like any ordinary Watch Band ! The stitching is neat and the Band fits well ! Fits my iwatch 42 mm well !
customer_reviews.author: Myra MLH

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch band!
customer_reviews.text: Update. I DID love this band It was the perfect look, size etc. Unfortunately a couple of weeks ago it broke. (the metal ring area that connects it to the watch) I did not know it they had a year warranty on it and I just threw it away. SO.... was it worth the cost for 6 months of use?? YES, but save it if it breaks and reach out to the company. It has just the look I wanted. Seems to be well constructed and fits the watch great. A great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Travelin Val

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Band!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a leather Apple Watch 2 band from Best Buy and I returned it because the stitching was horrible, attachments didn't seat correctly (was afraid my watch would become detached and fall off), and the leather was blotchy and poor quality. That awful band was $50 (!!!) Just got my new leather band from Marge Plus and it is twice as nice at a quarter of the price! Surprisingly well crafted, nice, even-colored supple leather (I got the brown), tight even stitching, and it snaps into the watch and aligns perfectly. Very happy with this purchase, will wear every day!
customer_reviews.author: Equestrienne

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had for almost a week, and the fit is comfortable and brings new life to my watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They sent a new band and it is wonderful! This one fits and buckles wonderfully! Thank you for sending the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Baker

customer_reviews.title: It's a great watch band and very stylish but it broke after ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great watch band and very stylish but it broke after a week of owning it. My watch fell on the ground and I was not a happy camper. But I was able to fix it by tightening the screws.company was great help and very kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Apple Watch band I've had. Marge Plus has amazing customer service! I will be buying other products from this amazing company.
customer_reviews.author: Moses M

customer_reviews.title: They've changed the band and now it's garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this band a year ago and loved it so much! It was gorgeous. I wore it so much when running that it started to smell (not the band's fault, mine). I decided to buy a new one. It is in no way the same band. The other one had a rich tanned leather color. This one is orangish and looks fake! It also has a different clasp. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Meganmh

customer_reviews.title: Just broke and watch fell off
customer_reviews.text: An hour ago I would have given this a great review. This was a comfortable band and snapped right in right to my Series 5 Apple Watch and looks good. Then it just fell off my wrist to the ground while walking. No impact or abuse what-so-ever. See picture. Durability should be 1/2 star. Update 3/5/2020: Received an email from reseller about sending me a replacement free of charge and then another email saying that I had to remove this review before they would send it or the rep would lose their job. Fact is... when this band broke my $1k Apple watch came flying off my wrist. It could have broken or been unrecoverable.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but used
customer_reviews.text: I just received the watch band, looks nice But looks like someone used it, the band was not straight and the band already had a curve and the small band rings were missing. Would rate it half a star or less if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP. looks nice in the picture and looks okay in person. However, the first day I wore it, there were scratch marks just from my adjusting the size. very disappointed. UPDATED: the seller kindly issued a refund as well as sent me the black band that is nice and doesn't look like it would scratch. I also should've mentioned that this is only $10 so can't expect too much, lol. However, the seller was nice enough to refund me and send me a new, different one, which they didn't have to do.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the pics advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. The color is not at all like the pics that advertise, I bought the tan brown leather strap, I what I got is a color tan more like an orange tan color, fake tan. The feel . is not of geniune leather, it feels more like plastic. Not at all satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: M. Cadenas

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Apple Watch 4
customer_reviews.text: Band is stuck in my watch, and even the Genius Bar cant get it out. Since it is not an Apple product, they will not fix it. I guess this is my forever band now. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jb3962

customer_reviews.title: Won’t come out once inserted
customer_reviews.text: Watch band looked great initially, but one of the bands would always be near impossible to get out. I would have to use so much force I was afraid I would rip the leather. Today, it absolutely would not budge. I had to get pliers to finally wedge it out, scratching my watch and tearing the material. Totally ruined and not worth a penny. Straight to the trash!
customer_reviews.author: lpd32

customer_reviews.title: Band is nice, seller doesn't respond to emails
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather. Fit my 6.25" wrist with room to spare (used the second hole from the end closest to the case). Unfortunately the metal the band attaches to was cracked. I emailed the seller several time (they provide a business card in the package insisting that they will reply promptly). Absolutely no response. Hence I am leaving this lackluster feedback for the customer service. I liked the band itself so I bought another one and this one had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Epuly, you have done it again!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to take the time out to thank you guys for adding watch band storage case for your customers! Second time around and I haven’t been disappointed yet. This watch band is definitely a steal for the price. Loving the real leather and I’m starting to fall in love with your products for sure ♥️. Will be purchasing more bands in the future. I feel better about my pockets buying from you guys then when I bought my first watch band from the Apple website!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Okay, when you pay hundreds of dollars for an a IPhone and Apple includes a silicone strap/band. In my opinion it just looks cheap. This watch band is exactly what I want searching for. It’s alligator design looks like a very expensive watch band. It’s durable and easy to install. I’ve had several compliments on it. If you have an occasion where you need to wear a suit or any formal wear, this watch band looks like a very expensive one. Would I recommend this? Absolutely !
customer_reviews.author: Gary -Florida

customer_reviews.title: and better hope you are fully satisfied with it because if ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very cheap.. and better hope you are fully satisfied with it because if you decide to return.. the return fee is almost the price of the item. Will not buy again and would not recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: Erika Helmick

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not secure for me.
customer_reviews.text: not sure if these reviews are accurate or if they are fake reviews being posted. I've purchased a number of items off of Amazon, but now I am starting to wonder about the products and reviews that are posted, not just this item but others as well. in regards to this product, it seems as if it is not secure enough for me from where the clasp is connecting to the watch face. Also rattles when a notification is received with a vibration. Don't get me wrong it looks good as a band, but it does have some concerns. hence the reason for the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: The Kemp's

customer_reviews.title: Husband liked the look, but his original Apple band was more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ebony/Silver Apple Watch band for my husband to ‘upgrade’ his Apple Watch band to something more trendy and dressier. While the band looks good and he agreed that it definitely makes his watch look nicer, my husband asked me to return the band because the original black band that came with his Apple Watch was more comfortable. In this case case - comfort overruled look. Still a good looking band, just not what my husband was looking for. I’m including a few photos to provide a closer look of what to expect from this band... Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, comfortable band
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch band, though I had to add an extra hole to it since I have small wrists. Despite that, it's quite comfortable, the attachments are well-designed. One of the connectors came loose, but it's designed to be fixed - I just needed an eyeglass screwdriver. Overall, it's a comfortable material, attractive and simple. A great deal for the price. Edit: I do really like this watch band, but one of the screws fell out again and this time it got lost, so now the band is broken and I can't wear it - I guess it's not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Series 4
customer_reviews.text: This watch band ends up being really loose and rips out my arm hair, also feels like it is scratching the inside of the Apple Watch. Avoid if on Series 4!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue leather watch band. I love the color and I think it was nice for the price. But about two-weeks after wearing it one of the small screws wiggled-out and detached from the band! Luckily the other screw was still secure and I didn't damage and/or loose my watch. I tightened the screw that came loose and thought I was ok...but a few days later the same thing happened. I had already disposed of the packaging. I didn't attempt to return. I didn't want to risk the screw coming out again so I am using a different watch band. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LostChemist

customer_reviews.title: Classy band
customer_reviews.text: I use this band for more formal events. Aesthetically speaking, it makes my watch go from sporty to classy in a few seconds. That being said, changing bands is easy if you're familiar with Apple watch's lug-less design. The shiny traditional buckle and white stitching (I got the black band) just adds to the premium look of the band, without the premium price. I'm already thinking about ordering a couple more in different colors. I highly recommend this band if you're looking to go leather.
customer_reviews.author: RB68

customer_reviews.title: Updated review. Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Updated review- 3rd picture. WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN. I guess you get what you pay for. Less then 6 months and it’s completely broken. Has been bending over over a month, the band itself takes on the color of jeans or basically anything. Lowering score Original review- Overall this watch band is great! I feel like the color is off band wise but matches perfectly headwear wise (the part that actually slides into the watch). I like that it has 2 parts to slide the excess length into. My only issue is it shows wear on the underside but other then that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Young

customer_reviews.title: band much shorter than seller's pictures.
customer_reviews.text: when I put my order, I did checked how the band hold watch on wrist. I saw a strong wrist with lots hairs, had a iwatch on. you can see the band on my wrist, not only band not long enough, the band looks way diffierec with seller's pictuures' show. if I use last hole, there is no way to hold band tail. Use secondly hole, it will be too tighten and not confortable. wish this information is useful to you.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week of wear
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this watch band. It's really cute and was quite comfortable, but completely broke after just 1 week of wear. I wasn't rough with it by any means - just went about my normal daily life at my desk job. After only a few days BOTH portions that connect the bands to the watch basically fell apart for seemingly no reason, and it was a real headache then trying to get the remaining pieces off of the watch. I'm hoping others have better luck and that I maybe received a faulty item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Band broke in 2 Months and fall scratched watch.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this band until it fell apart and my watch fell in the sidewalk and scratched it up. The pic shows the unique attachment bar that has a small screw in it that fell out. It looks nice but now I wish I never got it and used the standard Apple band that doesn’t use this faulty attachment method and won’t fail like this one did. For record I purchased this in August 2020 and it failed on September 22, 2020. I may contact the manufacturer to see if they will replace the band but I’m not sure I want it if they haven’t changed the band attachment design.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch band is Incredible !!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wasn't expecting a high quality band for the price... She love this band. It's perfect for her rose gold watch and it's actually way more comfortable than the original sport band the watch comes with. She has only worn it for a day, so can't say how long it lasts yet, but so far, I definitely got my money's worth and wouldn't mind buying again :)
customer_reviews.author: Prabhu

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for: purple & professional. The color (lavender) is so much prettier in person and the leather is incredibly soft. I thought for sure it was going to be stiff until I broke it in, at least for a couple of days, but boy was I surprised when it arrived. It’s so soft but not overly soft that I’m concerned about it falling apart. I am so happy with this band.
customer_reviews.author: T. V. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart and Watch Falls Off Wrist
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart twice due to an internal screw that secured band to watch, despite being gently worn. I LOVE this watch strap; it’s comfortable and looks great. I had hoped to avoid the problems others also had, but no such luck. Unfortunately it occurred after the return date. Despite fixing it, the problem happened again. Gave up and bought from a different vendor. Felt lucky not to lose my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A year later...
customer_reviews.text: The brown band still works with a bit more "character" (aka small scratches and darker color change) Pros: - The white stitching catches people's eyes. Get ready for complements :) - Easy to install and goes well with the watch Cons - The available wrist sizes are too small for me. Ended up having to drill new holes. Consider making a band for the petite population. Overall: Would buy again (despite the price increase)
customer_reviews.author: Ko

customer_reviews.title: Broke too quickly
customer_reviews.text: The look of the band was cheaper than I was expecting. It actually broke less than two weeks after I got it. The metal part that goes through the leather at the watch clasp broke on one side. Fortunately I was wearing a long sleeve shirt so my watch did not fall to the ground. I returned it and am getting a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t attach to the watch correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this in today for my series 3 watch and unfortunately it’s going to be a return. The new and improved screws in the ends that prevent falling out (per the new description of the item) don’t work. The mounts slide in and out of the watch without engaging the locking mechanism. If I fiddle with it I can get it to click, but then it sits in the channel loosely. When I put the band on and tighten it to fit, the corners of the mounting points protrude one way and sink in on the opposite end because it just doesn’t fit snugly. It’s a shame because the color and look of the leather is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing bands made from this band for a few years now and absolutely love them! I have red, dark blue, black, dark brown, gray, and now a light brown which goes well when going out to a restaurant or when you want to make your watch look good. I don't use these if i plan on working out but for going out these bands will save you a ton of money over the Apple brand bands.
customer_reviews.author: Fusionmtx

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a whopping 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Looks sharp for about two weeks. It started to wear out by about week 3 and now it just looks and smells gross. Keep in mind: - I never once sweat while wearing this - I wore it to the office (about 10 hours total a day) - The only liquid that touched it was the occasional splash from washing my hands Overall, not worth the money I spent on it. 1 star because despite it looking good and feeling fine on my wrist, 3 week lifespan of a watch band is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrigan clark

customer_reviews.title: Alright band, just a slight annoying issue.
customer_reviews.text: I like the build of the band, and I like the color, and it fits the watch well. The problem I had is that there is something with how the band is shaped that kept making my watch face turn upward when I twist my wrist to look at my watch, so that I would have to turn my wrist even further to see the time by activating the watch. It’s difficult to explain, but I think some people get it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Cool Band
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking band. I’ve only used it a few times but I like the contrast of the lighter colored stitching on the black band. As other reviewers mentioned, the metal is shinier than the case of the silver aluminum Apple Watch case but it still looks great. Great value for the cost. Update: I got a second of these bands in the brown color. The lighter stitching looks sharp on this too. Seems like good quality and I’d still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben_E

customer_reviews.title: Amazing replacement watch band
customer_reviews.text: This watch band is amazing, not only is it comfortable, it looks amazing. The quality and finish on the leather is unlike other apple watch bands. The other bands lack in the quality of the leather and it is not comfortable, but this apple watch band stands out with its amazing comfort and looks. For a small price, you get a AMAZING quality leather band with finishes, that are unlike others, and ultimately, it feels as if you are wearing a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Will return item
customer_reviews.text: After trafi g all the reviews I was so exited for this band . When it came this morning I put it right away on my watch . Took two hours and I almost lost my watch . When I was at the store loading out my groceries The watch fell of my wrist . Thanks to kind person behind me pointing this out since I did not feel it fel of . The scrues fell of so the whole band on one side . Will return it . Leather feels nice in hand
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a decent band, bits that fit into watch frame are slightly too small, rattle.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a high quality watch band. The leather is decent enough, and the color is great, but my main complaint is that the stainless steel bars at each end that seat into the watch frame are too small and rock/rattle. The fit just isn't good. It works fine and no one can tell, but it would be easy enough to manufacture something that has a better fit. Overall feel is cheap, I would not recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for every day!
customer_reviews.text: I got this band to add to my new watch wardrobe because I like the look of a basic leather for a casual but not athletic look. I ordered black but will likely get a brown one and add another look. This band is a very nice quality, has plenty of holes to fit different wrist sizes and it is easy to install and wear. It’s very comfortable, not sweaty like silicone and stays put nicely. It has two leather rings to hold the excess strap down. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Cranebubba

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable band
customer_reviews.text: It looks stylish and elegant on my 44 inch Apple Watch series 4. It is very comfortable, perfect fit and easy to install. This band perfectly matches with the space grey color Apple watch. I am using it for a week now and I use my watch heavily in gym then I thought sweating will be an issue with the leather but no issues with this one. I am happy with this stylish band which makes the watch very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Classy, durable, great product!
customer_reviews.text: This band is perfect if you’re business man, or only get dressed up on special occasions. I wore it to a formal gathering, and I received a complement from half of the room. The band is slightly narrower at the watch face of my Series 5 44mm, than I prefer. Although I know that’s the typical width of all leather bands on the market. It was stiff upon initially wearing, but broke in by the second day wearing. May not be real leather, although it feels and looks great. All for a fraction of the cost without sacrificing durability.
customer_reviews.author: Thurston Howell IV

customer_reviews.title: Best way to dress up your watch!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this band. I have only had it for a few days, so I cannot truly speak to the durability but it feels durable. I was looking for a band to 'dress up' my watch instead of having the silicone bands. This watch band does the trick. It feels like an everyday type band that will go with way more things than my other bands. It was extremely easy to put on and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I did not tighten the lose screw and my watch ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not tighten the lose screw and my watch fell face first onto the pavement! Luckily I had a screen protector and watch protector and no damage was caused. That’s the reason I’m giving it 4 and not a 5. I should not have to screw in a screw, the product should come assembled!! The screw is very small, I had to use a knife. Hopefully this does not happen again or the writing will go down.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice band. Easy to change and fits well
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid band and in my opinion it looks better than the silicone types, of which I've had 2. I don't really get my watch wet or expose it to the elements so I can't say how it holds up to moisture. It fits well and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: EngineNo9

customer_reviews.title: It looks really cool the only one problem is that they don't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really cool the only one problem is that they don't stay on the watch. You slide them off and they don't click in. Tried to get another one but they said that they couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Zeek

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch band
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality watch band which is easy to install. I inadvertently wore this in the shower and it had no problem being wet. It’s comfortable and even has a nice leather smell. This band is black with a silver colored buckle. White stitching thoroughly woven is a nice touch. I recommend this watch band if you are looking for something smart to wear with your Apple Watch series 5 44mm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wear the band for a couple of weeks before my review. This is a nice band. I ordered the 38mm brown strap and the leather is soft and light. The brown looks very nice against my aluminum watch. The stitching on the band is well done and the white stitching is a nice contrast. There are a few dark spots on my band from oil from the skin and daily wear. It's a strong band. I normally don't like to wear bands because they break me out especially around the clasp and no breakouts!!! I recommend this affordable alternative watch band for your Apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: SLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great looks
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about the Apple Watch is how quick and easy you can swap bands I love the finish on this band, as it goes with some Of my old leather apparel, especially my old bomber jacket. Very comfortable and very stylish
customer_reviews.author: willisotaTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a leather watchband and had bought one at a local box store in December. The band broke after about 40 days, so I looked on line for a replacement. This Alligator grain band seemed like the best combination of quality, style and value. It is a comfortable, well made watchband and looks great with my space gray Apple Watch. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: onadancer

customer_reviews.title: Screw popped out - watch fell off wrist.
customer_reviews.text: Please note - I attempted to communicate with the company directly about this (through the Amazon website) but my email was deemed not deliverable. After less than two months of intermittent wear, a screw popped out of the watch band. Fortunately the watch fell on a soft surface and was not damaged. I sort of fixed the screw, but it still appears loose. I am afraid to wear it for fear the watch will fall and break. To update, I called Amazon. They arranged a “return”. The amount of money being offered was less than what I paid for the band and I was responsible for return postage. It was not worth returning it. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Katayoun

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong 1 year later!
customer_reviews.text: I switched over to this band after a silicone band gave me a rash. This band is comfortable, adjustable, and very durable. I have been using this band pretty much every day for over a year, and aside from a little leather cracking on the interior of the band (not visible when wearing the watch), this band has held up great. I'm going to order a couple more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but fits differently than the cheaper rubbery watch bands.
customer_reviews.text: The product description said it would fit mt Apple Series 2 watch but the slide-in bars stick out a bit on either side. I am not sure if it is supposed to be this way but it is purely a cosmetic issue for me. My other watch bands were flush with the watch sides. Otherwise I am very pleased with the quality and comfort of this watchband, and I was happy to find it in rose gold color. Because it has a buckle I don’t worry about it coming apart and falling off my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Anonimouse

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I’ve been wearing this band for two weeks now, and the leather is super soft and flexible. I have a rather small wrist, so I run into problems trying to find watch bands sometimes, but this fits great. I just put the needle in the last hole, and I’m good to go! If you’re looking for a little more business casual or just casual look, then I think this is the perfect material and color band. Not to mention it’s unisex - several mornings I wake up to find the band missing because my boyfriend took it. I guess it’s time to purchase a second one! Definitely a great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but quality is eh
customer_reviews.text: This band looks nice and it comfortable to wear. It’s 3 stars because the first day I decided to wear it work the screws came out of the adapter the band it connected to. My watch almost fell but my sleeve caught it. I managed to get the very tiny screw back in place but the screw popped out pretty quick after. I probably won’t wear it again and since the window for return is gone I’ll just take the loss.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad K.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, good looking, what’s not to like
customer_reviews.text: I bought a series 4 stainless glossy space black watch with the standard silicone black band. I added 3 after market bands for about $35 or so for all of them. The other two were a stainless matte black link band, and a Milanese style black band. I chose the brown color and think it looks classy with this watch. It is comfortable. It may not look quite as nice as the genuine Apple band but at 1/10th the price I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Sidbury

customer_reviews.title: Light and classy
customer_reviews.text: I got this leather band to match a pair of shoes and belt in the same tan color and was impressed by the quality and feel. This has quickly become my favorite leather band. Other leather bands I’ve bought have been too thick. This one is really nice. Looks classy and wraps nicely around the wrist. As someone who owns 14 Apple watch bands, I can rate them with a fair degree of accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: George Pytlik

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Fun Colors.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful watch band. The leather feels soft and strong, an excellent value for the price. Its buckle is wide for ease-of-use and the color of both it and the leather is great. It's a beautiful color too, so it seems like it'll be a permanent addition to my Apple watch. Great product all around! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for 4 months - the clasp will no long catch.
customer_reviews.text: the metal clip slips off the clasp - they did not allow enough room for the clip to slide through the strap and onto the clasp without it slipping off....this has caused my watch to fall off my wrist a couple of times - at first I thought I had not clipped it properly - but it actually a defect in the workmanship - poor quality .... I can't recommend
customer_reviews.author: kirknotes7

customer_reviews.title: Stylish watch band!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product looking for a more elegant band for my Apple Watch, and I was not disappointed. This band might take a few uses to break in and bend with more ease, but it looks so great! It is also very easy to install, doesn't get stuck on the watch like some other cheaper bands I've used. Although it is not very expensive, you can feel that the band is made from high quality materials. Recommend this product to anyone looking to add a new look to their Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Leather strap for your Apple Watch. Feels good and looks expensive. Well done!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful band. The leather is comfortable and stitching is all in place. Looks like something Hermès would make. Easy to install. Looks great. The lugs are not color matched to the watch - unless you have a silver watch. But i like the contrast it has with the space gray case. But, it might not be everyone’s cup of tea so thought best to mention it.
customer_reviews.author: Initek

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I wore this band for only the second time today when, much to my surprise as I was walking to my car at a regular pace, my new watch flew clean off my wrist and smashed on the street. This band is TRASH. These guys should have to replace my watch considering their garbage is what broke it!
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great value and I love the look
customer_reviews.text: This is a re- order for me. My other band started looking a little discolored - and I love the worm leather look so I wanted to break another in. I love the way my watch looks and I actually had someone say they really liked my watch band but didn’t want to pay the high price for the Hermès watch band —-hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish band
customer_reviews.text: This band will make you feel like you’re a classical watch versus an Apple Watch but still manages to look really nice. I got the brown and black bands to go along with different colors I wear and so far it’s been great. Soft and doesn’t feel too rough to on your skin. I have yet how it stands the test of time but I’m not too worried. The leather feels real.
customer_reviews.author: Hicham

customer_reviews.title: Semi casual and good
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a semi casual look for your Apple Watch? Look no further! This is definitely what you're looking for. It feels and looks durable. The stitching are clean. It was easy to use and remove off the watch. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amaborn

customer_reviews.title: The clasp broke.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked the band when my husband gave it to me as a gift in May 2017 but the clasp broke on July 29, 2017 and I wore it 10-15 times to my office. Very disappointed that the return date ended July 9th and now all I have is a broken band.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas V Reinbold

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast delivery, and appears to be good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Came fast, packaged well. Everything appears to be as described. The only reason for the 4 stars is because I think the color is slightly off. I like the color in the pictures better than the color I received. Pictures attached (band I received vs professional photos on Amazon). Regardless, I am mostly happy with the purchase and will update if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I tried this watch band out everyday for a week before writing a review. This is my honest opinion. It is comfortable, decent and presentable. The leather is indeed genuine but only the outer layer. It has a soft flex to it. I also wore it playing tennis and didn’t have any discomfort. It was surprisingly breathable still. Another favorable band added to my growing collection of iwatch bands.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to measure carefully
customer_reviews.text: This band is awesome! It’s beautiful and durable real leather. One small issue, I didn’t check the measurements of my iWatch 3 as well as I should have and the metal sticks out of the sides. I took off a star not because of the quality but because the title is a little misleading because it says it should fit an iWatch 3. I’ll keep it on just because I like the band so much!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this product in 2017 and used it for two years with no issues. I ultimately decided to replace it with the same product, because it was beginning to look dirty. The new product works well with my Series 2 watch and is of the same quality of my last band. I will purchase these as long as they're available! Also - they look really sleek and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Their product is good finish and excellent quality. Their customer support is also very responsive and they will fix any problem you have with their product. I will purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Nader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday outfits
customer_reviews.text: I think this watch band is perfect for casual days. It feels super sturdy, and it looks really expensive. I think it will go really well for a guy or a girl. I highly recommend this if you want to save some money, but also have a band that looks like you spent a chunk of change on it. This is perfect, and it doesn’t irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Band stuck
customer_reviews.text: This watch band is very well made, looks great and my son was extremely impressed with it when it arrived. However, when we tried to take the band off it would not budge from the one side. It took us almost an hour to finally get it and that was with a lot of force and using a sharp object to push it out. This should never happen and obviously is a design flaw. We ordered a non-Apple product because the reviews were decent.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Runs really large!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality band and I really like the color. Only problem is, it’s too big on my wrist!! I have it on the last hole and I can still turn the watch all the way around on my arm... it doesn’t stay in place on my wrist since it’s too big. They should either punch one more hole in this band or it should come with 2 sizes in the box, like all the silicone bands do....
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a little over a month
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with the product at first. It seemed it was of good quality. The color didn’t change when water got on it and looked great with casual or dress outfits. If it hadn’t broken after having it for a little over a month I would have been really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: StrobelHouse

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed band fits in Apple Watch 2 very loose has ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed band fits in Apple Watch 2 very loose has alot of play. Feels like it is going to come undone or break the holding mechanism in the watch. Definitely will not be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Peterson

product_meta.title: Marge Plus Compatible with Apple Watch Band 42mm 44mm, Genuine Leather Replacement Band Compatible with Apple Watch Series 5 4 (44mm) Series 3 2 1 (42mm), Brown Band/Silver Adapter
feature_bullets: Compatible Models: Compatible with Apple Watch Series 5/ Series 4（44mm) / Series 3 / Series 2 / Series 1 /Edition (42mm).

Fit Size: Fits 6.3"-7.9" (160mm-200mm) wrist, it can be men's or women's, comfortable touch feeling on your wrist, simple but attractive, look fantastic and giving a nice professional look on any occasion.

Superior Quality: 100% Genuine Leather Band – Premium soft top genuine leather with fashionable craftsmanship, New stylish design, comes with stainless steel polished silver-coloured Classic buckle, anti-slip & sweat-absorbent.

Major Upgrade: Connector is UPGRADED that it will NEVER fall off as the screw and screw's depth is renewed and is added glue at the same time that it will be screwed more tightly and deeply. Band comes with stainless steel Connectors and Buckle.
Warm Tips: The Real Color of this item may be slightly different from the pictures shown on the website caused by many factors. Such as brightness of your monitor and light brightness.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars14,545 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Prefect fit men's or women's, Premium soft top genuine leather band, Compatible Models: Compatible Series 5 4 44mm, Series 3/ Series 2/Series 1/Edition 42mm, Fits 6. 3"-7. 9"
